comments.comment: I have said this many times in this forum. The responses of this Rajapakshas led government were always wrong or too late. Sri Lanakn new year period is a classic example. Why would someone sensible enough ease restrictions, especially when there was confirmation Delta variant within the general public, during the time that has a mass movement of people within the country. Simple answer is trivial political gains as well as the profound level of arrogance displayed by Gotabhaya by refusing to listen to advice by Public Health professionals. The government has failed miserably and the consequences are deadly. The rhetoric of " we have done exceotionally well" by Gotabhaya is laughable now and in the future will define his legacy. üòí
Nero fiddles while Rome burns and Gota plays deaf and dumb while Serendib sinks.
